alert.note: Alert for Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 03 at 2:27PM EST until January 04 at 4:36AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Lingering flooding caused by earlier excessive rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of Northern Kentucky, including the following county, Pendleton. * WHEN...Until 430 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 225 PM EST, local law enforcement reported minor flooding, with lingering high water over some area roadways. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Morgan, Mckinneysburg, Marcus and Browning Corner.
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. To report flooding, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
